tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Interaction (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT NOT NULL,
	interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
	interaction_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Contraindication (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT NOT NULL,
	contraindication_type VARCHAR(50),
	contraindication_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug (id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugLabeling (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT NOT NULL,
	regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
	labeling_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug (id),
	FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES LabelingRegulation (id)
);
